subject: Medicine
title: Sugar Pills That Work
description: A quick, practical guide to Sugar Pills That Work.

hook.text: A pill with zero medicine in it can still reduce your pain.

buildup.text: Patients given fake treatments often report real improvement.

discovery.text: This is the placebo effect: belief triggers real body changes.

twist.text: Brain scans show placebos activate the same pain pathways.

climax.text: The brain releases real painkillers called endorphins.

punchline.text: Belief alone can trigger real chemistry.

quiz.question: What does the brain release during a placebo pain response?
